headline: How Investors May Respond To Franklin Resources (BEN) DOJ Closure Of Western Asset Probe
summary: Earlier in December 2025, the Justice Department informed Western Asset Management, an affiliate of Franklin Resources, that its investigation would be closed without filing any charges related to alleged client favoritism in trading. This resolution removes a significant legal and reputational overhang for Franklin Resources, potentially clarifying the risk profile around one of its key fixed-income platforms. We’ll now examine how the clearance of Western Asset’s investigation reshapes...

headline: Lexington Partners Expands Global Presence with Opening of Abu Dhabi Office
summary: Lexington Partners ("Lexington"), one of the world's largest and most experienced managers of secondary private equity and co-investment funds, today announced the opening of its new office in Abu Dhabi, expanding the firm's global footprint to nine offices across four continents.

content.title: Lexington Partners Expands Global Presence with Opening of Abu Dhabi Office

headline: Franklin Resources (BEN): Reassessing Valuation After DOJ Clears Western Asset Trade Allocation Probe
summary: Franklin Resources (BEN) just got a meaningful overhang lifted, with the U.S. Department of Justice confirming it will close its probe into Western Asset’s past trade allocations without criminal charges. See our latest analysis for Franklin Resources. The DOJ overhang easing comes on top of a busy few weeks for Franklin Resources, from launching new ETFs, including a Solana product, to deepening its alternatives education push with CAIA. The stock’s roughly 17 percent year to date share...
